title: Beautiful Lennard Island
creator_credit: Beverly Shaffer, Kathleen Shannon, Yuki Yoshida and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: Steven Thomas Holland, age ten, is the son of a lighthouse-keeper who mans Lennard Island, a tiny place west of Vancouver Island. There is a population of four: mother, father and brother David. A gracious host and articulate fan of his beautiful island home, he takes us on a tour and dispels any ideas we might have that living in isolation is boring.
